trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the recipient of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is the XML Web service, the XML Web service client, or both.
trans-unit.target: Anger om mottagaren av den <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> är XML-webbtjänsten, XML-webbtjänstklienten eller båda.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> can be applied to either an XML Web service method or a method of a proxy class to an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>kan tillämpas på ett XML-webbtjänstmetoden eller en metod för en proxyklass till en XML-webbtjänst.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>

trans-unit.source: In either case, the recipient(s) are specified by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: I båda fallen anges mottagarna av <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify that an XML Web service method returns a SOAP header when an exception is thrown during its execution, apply an <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> to the method and set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> property to Fault.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ange att ett XML-webbtjänstmetoden returnerar ett SOAP-huvud när ett undantag under exekveringen, tillämpa en <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>metod och ange den <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A>egenskapen till fel.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Version 1.0 of the .NET Framework does not support the Fault value.
trans-unit.target: Version 1.0 av .NET Framework stöder inte värdet för sidfel.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to the XML Web service client when an exception is thrown by the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Anger den <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> skickas till XML-webbtjänstklienten när ett undantag av XML-webbtjänstmetoden.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to the XML Web service.
Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to both the XML Web service and the XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: Anger den <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> skickas till både XML-webbtjänsten och XML-webbtjänsten service-klienten.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to the XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: Anger den <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> skickas till XML-webbtjänsten service-klienten.
